exhibits.description: Isabella has historically been an Impressionist. Impressionism, popularized by artists such as Claude Monet and Pierre-Auguste Renoir, focuses on capturing the fleeting impressions of light and atmosphere through loose brushwork and vibrant colors. Today, Isabella is inspired by her recent trips to Africa.

Elijah is a Surrealist. Inspired by dreams, the subconscious mind, and irrationality, artists like Salvador Dalí and René Magritte created imaginative and often bizarre artworks that allow for the exploration of the unconscious mind. However, Elijah Montrose is famous for bringing a sense of childlike wonder and whimsy to his portraits and is inspired by his upbringing in Bali.
Adelaide Delacroix is best known for her ability to blend futuristic symbolism with a Renaissance art style. Her inspirations are her pet chinchilla named C-3PO.

youth_group_visits.description: For larger youth groups consisting of a minimum of 8 or more visitors, please contact our group sales directly at 555-555-1234 to organize your specific agenda. Our museum offers numerous bespoke tours for youth groups of varying sizes lasting anywhere from 2 to 6 hours during normal school/business hours as well as an overnight offering.

overnight_tour.details: Our youth overnight tour provides an exclusive experience for your small group. A special scavenger hunt is organized to encourage exploration of the facility as well as learning. Refreshments are provided.
overnight_tour.requirements: Please have each individual bring their own sleeping bag and pillow.

special_events.description: Our annual calendar of special events includes:

May.name: Annual Film Festival
May.details: May is our annual film festival where local creators bring their best works of art culled from their top-performing YouTube performances, complete with live presentations on their inspirations as well as a live stream broadcast.

August.name: Carnival Atmosphere
August.details: A carnival-like atmosphere with live performances by local buskers throughout our facility, including magicians, balloon animals, whimsical musicians, elaborate costumes, living statues, and much more.
